description: This Kung Pao chicken recipe is packed with intense smoky Asian flavours and is a quick and easy to make midweek meal that the whole family will devour.
keywords: Kung Pao Chicken with Smokey Roast Almonds
name: Kung Pao Chicken with Smokey Roast Almonds Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Once the sauce has started to reduce, remove from the heat and serve garnished with smoked almonds with a choice of condiments.
